activities:
Leadership and organizational development assessment solutions. Assessment Plus helps organizations with unique corporate cultures develop effective, successful leaders. We achieve this with customized assessment-based tools and the commitment to transform information into insight, action and results.

In order to provide assessment services to you, we typically require and collect the following information… 

Your name 
Your email address 
Any assessment responses you provide on yourself or others. This includes but is not limited to both fixed- and open-ended responses to survey items. 
For instances in which one of our associates or partners needs to contact you directly (such as in the case of one-on-one feedback coaching), we may optionally request the following additional information from you or your employer… 

Your telephone number 
Your business mailing address 
Your title 
Collection and use of technical information 

Any information you submit online is transmitted using the highest security standards available. All internet data is transmitted using SSL encryption. In addition, all of our internet applications have many levels of supplemental application security. Our systems do not use cookies, apart from temporary, encrypted "session" cookies which enable our systems to authenticate users across multiple pages in our systems.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
orgverification: Third Party - BBB EU Safe Harbor
personaldata: Off-line and on-line survey data and demographics.
